评论详情: I received my order pretty quickly and was immediately in love with my new ring. It's small but not super dainty, nor is it flimsy. I'm very happy and will buy another very soon so that I can wear them stacked.
It is very dainty and cute. It fits well and has held up to my daily wear for weeks without looking tarnished or different.Great Quality and Such a beautiful classy ring! Really enjoying it!
The ring is really nice, well made it, super stylish and don’t look tacky at all. I wash my hands and still keep very well the gold tone. Very happy with my purchase.
